member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: This class contains methods for string manipulation.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: This method performs string convertion of the input string to a hash.
member.return: Hash is in format hexadecimal string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks, if string contains any of the given string array elements.
member.return: True, if the string contains any of the given string array elements and False, if it does not contain

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks, if string is valid short number.
member.return: String in format short, if it is valid short number.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks, if string is valid int number.
member.return: String in format int, if it is valid int number.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks, if string is valid long number.
member.return: String in format long, if it is valid long number.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks, if string is valid DateTime.
member.return: String in format DateTime, if it is valid DateTime value.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: This method transforms the string's first letter to a capital letter.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method gets the string between two other strings.
member.return: 1. In case input string does not contain startString or endString , returns empty string. 2. The string between two strings as a string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts string with cyrillic letters to a string with latin letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts string with latin letters to a string with cyrillic letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts string with cyrillic letters to a string with latin letters and removes all characters from the string different from "a - z", "A - Z", "0-9","_\." .
member.param: Insert string with cyrillic or cyrillic and latin letters,numbers and symbols.
member.return: String with latin letters, numbers and symbols.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: This method converts string with cyrillic letters to a string with latin letters, converts " " with "-" and removes all characters from the string different from "a - z", "A - Z", "0-9","_\." .
member.param: Insert string with cyrillic or cyrillic and latin letters,numbers and symbols.
member.return: String with latin letters, numbers and symbols.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method extracts substring from the string starting from the beginning of the string, the extracted substring's lenght is equal to the number inputed for the parameter charsCount.
member.return: Substring with the given lenght or the whole string, if the charsCount number is bigger than string's lenght.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: This method splits the string into an array of strings by dot ".".
member.return: 1. Returns "" empty string, if string is null, whiteSpace or the last item in the array is not a string. 2. String with no white spaces in the beginning or the end and with lowercase letters.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: This method checks,if string's value matches with a key value from the dictionary.
member.return: 1. If string's value matches with a key value from the dictionary, the content from the key is returned. 2. When no match is found the string "application/octet-stream" is returned.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: This method creates a byte array with number of bytes equal to input.Length * sizeof(char).
member.return: Byte array with the string's bytes.
